dct_title_s: Persia, the Caspian Sea : done by ye Czar, and part of Independent Tartary by ... with his tract from Astracan to Gilan in Persia above 2700 Eng[lish] miles
dct_description_sm: Imprint derived from the atlas in which the map was issued. Numbered 35. Notes about the caravan from Astracan. London meridian.
dct_publisher_sm: [London : Printed for Tho. Bowles and John Bowles, 1732?]
